accessibility.text: The Game
The Game
A 2-player turn-based co-operative game with a goal to generate the required sentence
The Game
A 2-player turn-based co-operative game with a goal to generate the required sentence
A player can do any of the following in its turn:
The Game
A 2-player turn-based co-operative game with a goal to generate the required sentence
A player can do any of the following in its turn:
Generate word(s)
The Game
A 2-player turn-based co-operative game with a goal to generate the required sentence
A player can do any of the following in its turn:
Generate word(s)
Switch and transfer control to other player
The Game
A 2-player turn-based co-operative game with a goal to generate the required sentence
A player can do any of the following in its turn:
Generate word(s)
Switch and transfer control to other player
Terminate the sentence
The Game
A 2-player turn-based co-operative game with a goal to generate the required sentence
A player can do any of the following in its turn:
Generate word(s)
Switch and transfer control to other player
Terminate the sentence
It can also pass some information to the other player in the switch action (eg. the last word it produced, etc)
